item.description: uni.uploadFile(OBJECT) # The local resources uploaded to the developer server, the client initiates a POSTrequest, which content-typeis multipart/form-data. OBJECT parameter description parameter name Types Required Description url String Yes Developer server url name String Yes The key corresponding to the file, the developer can obtain the binary content of the file through this key on the server side header Object no HTTP request Header, Referer cannot be set in the header.

uni.request(OBJECT) # Initiate a network request. OBJECT parameter description parameter name Types Required Defaults Description Platform difference description url String Yes Developer server interface address data Object/String no Requested parameters header Object no Set the requested header. Referer cannot be set in the header. method String no GET See the description below for valid values dataType String no json If set to json, it will try to do a JSON.
